sourcesContent:
import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function MyNavbar() { const location = useLocation() return (
  • Home
    • Shows
  • Movies
  • Recent
  • List
  • KIDS
  • {/* Example single danger button */}
    • Ubeyt
    • Manage Profiles
    • Account
    • Help Center
    • Signout Netflix
); } export default MyNavbar;
